abstract: Science Applications International Corporation, company that was in charge of New York City’s scandal-plagued CityTime payroll project, fires three senior managers and hires a law firm to review its ethics and practices.
snippet: Science Applications International Corporation, which was in charge of the CityTime project, said it had dismissed managers and hired a law firm to review its ethics.
lead_paragraph: Science Applications International Corporation, which was in charge of the CityTime project, said it had dismissed managers and hired a law firm to review its ethics.

headline.main: Company on City’s Payroll Project Fires Three
headline.print_headline: Company on City’s Payroll Project Fires Three
headline.seo: Company in CityTime Payroll Project Fires 3 Managers
